p.codeblock: curl -L -X PUT 'http://localhost:8080/api/xmen/{id}' \ -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \ -X-API-KEY: '{key}' -d '{ "id": 4, "name": "Hisako Ichiki", "heroName": "Armor", "power": "Psionic exoskeleton armor", "debut": "Astonishing X-Men #4 (2004)", "creator": "Joss Whedon, John Cassaday" }'
